meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of feces.
meanings.sent1: The faecal sample was sent to the lab for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the faecal matter for any signs of infection.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue in the faecal evidence left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: The faecal odor in the bathroom was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The faecal stain on the carpet was difficult to remove.

meanings.definition: Containing or relating to waste matter discharged from the bowels.
meanings.sent1: The nurse disposed of the faecal waste in a hygienic manner.
meanings.sent2: The faecal contamination in the water supply caused a health scare.
meanings.sent3: The faecal matter clogged the pipes, leading to a plumbing disaster.
meanings.sent4: The faecal bacteria in the food caused a widespread illness.
meanings.sent5: The faecal discharge from the patient indicated a digestive issue.
